ComicInfo.Series: Lady Mechanika: The Tablet of Destinies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lady Mechanika journeys to the Continent on rumors that young Winifred was taken to the German countryside and imprisoned in a remote castle. But is the source of these rumors a friend or foe? And what is his true interest in the Tablet of Destinies? Ships with a cover from Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel and Mike Montiel (cover A) and a cover from Benitez and Peter Steigerwald (cover B).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel & Mike Garcia | 1 | B | Cover B | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 2 | C | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Joe Benitez & Martin Montiel | 4 | D | JoeBenitez.com Online Exclusive Cover (Limited to 500 copies) | Joe Benitez & Sabine Rich | 5 | E | BlueRainbow Exclusive Variant Cover (Limited to 500 copies) | Dawn McTeigue & Ula Mos | Missing | S | San Diego Comic-Con Sketch Edition Cover (Limited to 200 copies) | Joe Benitez | Missing | W | White Cover (Limited to 250 copies) | Joe Benitez | 3 | Note: Covers are lettered (A-Z) according to JoeBenitez.com.
